                          eu.clementime.rds.InventoryItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.anddev.andengine.engine.handler.IUpdateHandler, org.anddev.andengine.entity.IEntity, org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene.ITouchArea, org.anddev.andengine.entity.shape.IShape, org.anddev.andengine.opengl.IDrawable
public class InventoryItem
extends org.anddev.andengine.entity.sprite.Sprite

Item stored in doll inventory, with small sprite for normal view, big sprite for zoom or drag and drop, and inventory item sprite itself for... uh? for what? oh, yes, for the box containing the item!! A bit tricky, I confess.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Clément
